name: Devil May Cry 2
description: The sequel to Devil May Cry®, Devil May Cry® 2 introduces Dante’s devilishly agile partner Lucia. Together, she and Dante join forces to take on a horde of demons led by an evil man hell-bent on achieving supreme power. With dazzling aerials and intuitive control mechanics, Devil May Cry® 2 broke new barriers of stylish combat.
